text: @NYGovCuomo You're the best Gov. I don't think your idea to make the "SS COMFORT" for COVID-19 patients ONLY is a good idea. It was originally meant for "NON- COVID-19" patients. you said there's more "COVID-19 than "NON-COVID'19" patients.whats the logic here?
